text: Cees Veerman (6 October 1943 - 15 March 2014) was a Dutch musician. He was a singer, composer and guitarist for the rock band The Cats. He was born in Volendam in the province of North Holland. Veerman died in his sleep on the morning of 15 March 2014 in Yogyakarta, Yogyakarta Special Region, Indonesia. He was 70 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Cees Veerman at Discogs Category:1943 births Category:2014 deaths Category:20th-century Dutch composers Category:21st-century Dutch composers Category:Dutch guitarists Category:Dutch singer-songwriters Category:Musicians from North Holland Category:Rock composers Category:Rock guitarists Category:Rock singers
title: Cees Veerman (musician)
